players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out today."
Charlie: "I have nothing to hide and believe that open communication will help us identify the real mafia in our midst. Let's focus on gathering information and working together as a team."
You: "I trust Bob's investigation. Charlie is the mafioso. Let's vote him out."

Charlie: "I believe in the power of transparency and collaboration. Let's not jump to conclusions based on assumptions. I did not kill Diana, and I urge everyone to investigate further and consider all possibilities before making any decisions."
You: "I trust Bob's investigation. Charlie is mafia. Let's vote him out."
Bob: "I trust my investigation. Charlie is mafia. Let's vote him out."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out today."
Charlie: "I have nothing to hide and believe that open communication will help us identify the real mafia in our midst. Let's focus on gathering information and working together as a team."
Alice: "I trust Bob's investigation. Charlie is the mafioso. Let's vote him out."

Charlie: "I believe in the power of transparency and collaboration. Let's not jump to conclusions based on assumptions. I did not kill Diana, and I urge everyone to investigate further and consider all possibilities before making any decisions."
Alice: "I trust Bob's investigation. Charlie is mafia. Let's vote him out."
You: "I trust my investigation. Charlie is mafia. Let's vote him out."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie

Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out today."
You: "I have nothing to hide and believe that open communication will help us identify the real mafia in our midst. Let's focus on gathering information and working together as a team."
Alice: "I trust Bob's investigation. Charlie is the mafioso. Let's vote him out."

You: "I believe in the power of transparency and collaboration. Let's not jump to conclusions based on assumptions. I did not kill Diana, and I urge everyone to investigate further and consider all possibilities before making any decisions."
Alice: "I trust Bob's investigation. Charlie is mafia. Let's vote him out."
Bob: "I trust my investigation. Charlie is mafia. Let's vote him out."
